name: Mages on Mountains
description:
Welcome to the world of Mages on Mountains.

### 

You can try to play this game directly in your browser. 

If it does not work properly, you can also download the APK File to your Android device 

###

MoM is a fast-paced puzzle game where you are a wizard and have to defeat the enemy as fast as possible. Look for the one spell you and your enemy have in common and cast it faster than your opponent. 

Currently, this game is in a pretty early (prototype-) state. I'm planning to release it on mobile in the end of 2023.

Some future-ideas:

- Levelselection with various enemies and difficulties

- Level-up / Exp - System to increase Damage, Health etc. of your Mage

- PvP

My Name is Phil and I'm currently working on my first solo-project for mobile-devices. Since I'm pretty new to the gamevev-community, it would be great if you could leave some feedback in here.

Thanks a lot =)
